title: Enabling the Digital Democratic Revival: A Research Program for Digital Democracy
column3: This white paper outlines a long-term scientific vision for the development of digital-democracy technology. The paper is co-authored by an international and interdisciplinary team of researchers and arose from the Lorentz Center Workshop on Algorithmic Technology for Democracy (Leiden, October 2022).
